TopicTitle: Reapers Dutch Designs (THE STEALTH) a vtol ssto

Articles.Content:
hey guys i'm back after posting nothing for a long time.

i proudly present "the stealth" a vtol ssto.

![y70icrV.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/y70icrV.jpg)

![xJD2PY4.png](http://i.imgur.com/xJD2PY4.png)

the Copit it is based in part on the design by yakuzi.

![krflZAY.png](http://i.imgur.com/krflZAY.png)

the vtol engine is nicely tucked away.

![ohVKhzd.png](http://i.imgur.com/ohVKhzd.png)

speeding up in to the sky.

![MAEtrWd.png](http://i.imgur.com/MAEtrWd.png)

toggle:

1 toggle's the turbo engine.

2 toggle's the rapier engine.

3 toggle's the vtol engine.

4 toggles the airintake's.

5 toggles the rapier engine mode.

6 toggles the copit.

7 toggles the dockingport.

8 handbrake with out airbrake's.

pressing the brake butten turns on the airbrake's (rockomax engine's)

video:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/iV2BNVk0jWo?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

you like what you see? wanne help? PRESS THE LIKE BUTTON!!!!! lol ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

the craft file:

[http://www./download/vj7st94obeymjr1/stealh_ssto.craft](http://www./download/vj7st94obeymjr1/stealh_ssto.craft)

> wow! very nice design!

thanks i really like the way this one turn out
Wow I love that but I like my stealth planes small! I like flying small nippy planes
Very nice! I really like those intake structures on the top and bottom!

Looking sleek soulreaver, great lines!

> 
> the Copit it is based in part on the design by yakuzi.

Hey, thanks for the cockpit ref (although not quite necessary) ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)!
